reviews.review_text: Dang Good Ice is the best in the city! We have been purchasing their ice for almost two years for our Cold Plunge Crew events to provide our guests with the best ice bath experience. They have an incredible customer service and delivery. They are always on time.

The marketing agency that I work for has used Dang Good Ice delivery service on numerous occasions for various events and parties that we have hosted over the past few years! They have been nothing short of fantastic in terms of product, service, as well as fair pricing! Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for kind words. We hope your summer bbq went well. Looking forward to servicing you for your ice delivery needs

reviews.review_text: Weve recently had an outdoor event server 700+ people, and Dang Good came in at the last min to help us serve cool down drinks to our attendees! The big cooler rental was able to keep the ice overnight to be used in the early morning next day because the ice we needed outside of their delivery window. The delivery service was fast, simple, and totally reliable, especially on the weekends! Thank you to Christina, Jeff, and the rest of the team to making this happen. Many happy faces that day. I will be putting them on my order for my next event!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, what an incredible event you hosted for 700+ people! Were absolutely thrilled that we could assist you with our Vancouver Ice Delivery service, especially on such short notice.

reviews.review_text: We had an emergency and needed wet ice for our facility. They were able to arrive to us in 2 hours without issues and understood our concerns and documents required. Good pricing and speedy delivery and great customer service. Add this company to your contact list. Will use again in the future.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much. Hope youve been keeping cool!

reviews.review_text: Dang Good Ice was the perfect service that I needed! They delivered on time, had the ice on location inside the venue just as asked for. Great communication and suggest the right amount of ice for our event. The large cooler was great for the event as well, kept the ice cold all night. Will definitely use them again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your fantastic review! Were thrilled to have provided the perfect service for your needs. Its wonderful to know that our ice delivery was on time and set up

reviews.review_text: We used Dang Good Ice for our Pitt Meadows Airport Day beer garden and I cant recommend them enough.  They were professional and helped determine the perfect amount of ice to use for the event!  They also supplied us with a mobile ice caddy to use on the day of the event to keep the ice cold and on-hand and it was a life-saver.  Delivery of the ice and pick-up of the caddy was a breeze and we will definitely be using them again for future events.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your fantastic review! Were thrilled to have been a part of your Pitt Meadows Airport Day beer garden event. Its wonderful to hear that our ICE services contributed positively to the events success.

reviews.review_text: When youre throwing an event, having vendors you can trust makes all the difference. Dang Good Ice makes getting ice easy and streamlined. Theyre responsive, accommodating, punctual, and super friendly. Always a pleasure working with them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words and positive feedback regarding our ice delivery service! We understand how crucial it is to have reliable vendors when organizing an event, and were thrilled to be that trusted choice for you.

reviews.review_text: Great service. Ive been using them since 2016 and they have never let me down. Lots of last minute orders that were delivered quickly and without incident. Thanks Guys
reviews.response_from_owner_text: It has been a pleasure serving you Len thanks for making us Vancouvers Best Ice Delivery Company. We look forward to serving you in the near future.

reviews.review_text: Our Ice Machine has been on the fritz at work. Waiting on a part. Placed an order at 415 pm, they showed up at 435pm cause they were in the area! So fast and convenient!! Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you choosing Vancouvers Ice Delivery to help you. Were happy that we were able to help the team stay cool.

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend to any one looking for ice. We had an emergency during a power outage and needed ice and they stepped up and made sure we were covered. Great customer service and very timely response.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your 5 star review. We are strive to be Vancouvers top Ice delivery for emergency delivery during a power outage.

reviews.review_text: Dang Good Ice was a LIFE SAVER! Hosted a softball tournament and needed multiple ice trips to keep our bevvies nice and cold over the course of the weekend. They respond super fast and delivered straight to the ball park for us. THANK YOU to the entire Dang Good Ice team!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf of the entire Dang Good Ice team, we want to extend our heartfelt thanks for choosing our services.

reviews.review_text: Best ICE around! Greatest prices and fastest service, it would be a waste of time/money to get ICE from anywhere else. These guys are down to earth and easy going. Plus they sell proper whiskey ice cubes, good stuff!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad we could help you keep your drinks cool cheers

reviews.review_text: Ordered online for pick-up & everything was super smooth. The gentleman assisting me when I arrived for my pick up time was very informative & gave some great tips on how to keep ice for longer periods outside   We will definitely be using them again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your wonderful review! Were delighted to hear that your online order for ice delivery and pick-up went smoothly. Its great to know that our team member was informative and provided valuable tips on keeping ice for extended periods outdoors.

reviews.review_text: A great bunch of people to deal with! One thing I really appreciated was when I got directions, they provided very detailed instructions on where to find them. Not just the address but where to specifically go to pick up the ice at the back of the building. Attention to details means a lot. Especially with ice!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were truly grateful for your kind words and positive feedback! Its wonderful to hear that you had a great experience dealing with us. We understand the importance of clear directions, especially when it comes to finding us and picking up ice. Attention to details is something we value!

reviews.review_text: We contacted Dang Good Ice for an event we were having and couldn t have made a better decision. Amazing service. Very communicative. Recommend them 10000%
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your glowing review! Were thrilled that you chose Vancouver Ice Delivery for your event and that you had an amazing experience with our service. If you ever need ice or our Vancouver ice delivery service in the future, please dont hesitate to get in touch. Wed be more than happy to assist you again!

reviews.review_text: Excellent service and communication. Took care to help us secure ice caddy in a vehicle and made sure we had a good plan to transport our ice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for choosing us to help you out on your special day.

reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service! They really went out of their way to make sure I got enough ice for my ice cream. Would recommend this to anyone
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your glowing review! Were thrilled to hear that you had an excellent experience with our customer service.

reviews.review_text: We purchased from Dang Good Ice for our 10 year business anniversary and they were really helpful accommodating us on our tight schedule and also providing guidance for how much ice we needed. They also helped make our event extra special with custom branded ice (which was such a hit!!). The order process and delivery was seamless and I would work with them again for any holiday parties, work events or even personal!
Absolutely wonderful experience using Dang Good Ice!  The service was prompt and friendly.  I would definitely recommend the team at Dang Good for your ice needs :-)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing Vancouver Ice Delivery by Dang Good Ice! Were thrilled to hear that you had an absolutely wonderful experience with our service. Prompt and friendly service is what we strive for, and were delighted that we could meet your expectations. Your recommendation means a lot to us, and were here to fulfill all your ice needs whenever you require them!

reviews.review_text: Excellent and friendly service. The employee went out of his way to help us and made it very convenient! Would definitely recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were thrilled to hear that you had an excellent experience with our Vancouver ice delivery service. Our team takes great pride in providing friendly and accommodating service, and its wonderful to hear that our employee went out of their way to make your experience convenient. We believe in going the extra mile to ensure our customers satisfaction, and your feedback reinforces our commitment to this principle.

reviews.review_text: So accessible and efficient. Whether you need ice delivered to you or a pick up from their warehouse, the make the process seamless and efficient. 10:10
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience with our ice delivery service! Accessibility and efficiency are two key aspects we prioritize, whether youre in need of ice delivered to your location or if you prefer to pick up from our warehouse. Its great to know that our efforts have resulted in a seamless and efficient process for you.

reviews.review_text: We ve been using Dang Good for almost a year now and the service has been excellent! The new packaging is so much better and they always deliver on time. Would highly recommend to anyone! Great communication and flexibility. Thanks from Banter Room!
Jeff was very helpful and better to stop here than at a gas station for ice. They have plenty of stock as well as bigger sized bags.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience! Were thrilled to hear that Jeff provided helpful service during your visit. Its great that you found our location to be a convenient stop for ice, especially with our plentiful stock and larger-sized bags.

reviews.review_text: Dex and team are always super helpful, reliable, and the best person to get ice from for all sorts of needs. Thanks team!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Peter were soo happy to help you out. Hope our bagged ice are keeping your ice bath nice and cool

reviews.review_text: Super reliable, fast delivery and great customer service! The Eastside Flea loves you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for trusting us in your ice delivery needs

reviews.review_text: Dex and the team were absolute professionals. They were able to help me out on short notice, and I will never work with any other ice supplier in the future. They are the real deal. I cant recommend them enough. 10 stars!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We understand that sometimes you need help on short notice, and were here to make it happen. Your loyalty and recommendation mean the world to us

reviews.review_text: Above and beyond service!!! A great deal on ice for parties, camping, bbqs. Jeff is the best. Thanks again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: If you ever need ice delivery or any assistance in the future, please dont hesitate to get in touch.

reviews.review_text: Great customer service and quality of the products. They also supported my non profit with a really good discount allowing us to maximize the funds raised at our event so Im super grateful. Thank you!!
Staff was very friendly and very helpfull. Was able to change my pick up time very easily.  Pick up was great.  Highly recommend this business.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear that you found our Vancouver Ice Delivery staff to be friendly and helpful.

reviews.review_text: Unbelievable service and great experience with friendly staff. Fast service thxs a million
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad were able to keep the drinks cool at your event.

reviews.review_text: Great people and service, price is much better than grocery stores or gas stations.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We truly appreciate your positive feedback and support! Providing excellent service and building great relationships with our customers is a priority for us. Were glad to hear that you find our prices for ice delivery to be more competitive than those at grocery stores or gas stations.

reviews.review_text: Quick and reliable service on a long weekend.  Delivery and cost was fair value.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: If you ever need ice delivery or any assistance in the future, please dont hesitate to get in touch. Thank you for choosing us and taking the time to share your experience!

reviews.review_text: Amazing experience! We were able to get same day delivery multiple times as our ice machine stopped working. Thanks again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad we were able help you stay cool when your ice machine went down

reviews.review_text: Dang good ice has always been on top of their game! Especially during this heat wave! We ordered ice for a last minute hike, thankfully with their great customer service they responded quick and we were able to receive our order last minute! Alongside with their great product knowledge they recommend us to get king cubes due to their slower melting time so that we could get the best of the best with our drinks!!! Hands down, best ice delivery service you can get!

The team at Dang Good Ice are great individuals and show a great level of professionalism as well as surpassing industry standards in customer service and quality. Just like their ice, their services are DANG GOOD.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Mark! Always happy to hear such kind words from a local guide ;) stay cool.

reviews.review_text: If you need ice in Vancouver, Dang Good Ice should be your first call. They offer excellent products, reliable service, and are always a pleasure to deal with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Parker! Happy to assist with your ice needs.

reviews.review_text: We hosted a large corporate event on Bowen Island. Dex delivered our ice on time and the price was very reasonable. I will not hesitate to use Dang Good for all of my event ice needs in the future. Great service, good price and quality product.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad we can help you with your big event!

reviews.review_text: Awesome. On time and so took the stress out on a busy pre party. And great ice too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your awesome review! Were thrilled to hear that our Vancouver ice delivery service made your pre-party preparations stress-free. Punctuality is essential to us, and were delighted to know that we were on time for your convenience. Were also pleased that you enjoyed our high-quality ice.

reviews.review_text: Highly recommend these guys! Always coming up with new ideas, great customer service. Willing to go the extra mile to make sure the clients are happy. Had some logistic issues due to some unexpected snow and they were great at getting me what I ordered in a timely manner. Thanks so much guys keep up the great work!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad we can help! Thanks for your kind words. Call us any time for your ice needs :)

reviews.review_text: Great customer service and delivery on time as requested. A+++
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your positive feedback! Were thrilled to know that you had a great experience with our customer service and that your ICE delivery was prompt and as requested. Your A+++ rating means a lot to us

reviews.review_text: I was having a difficult time finding ice in blocks. It used to be sold at gas stations and convenience store machines, but all the ones near me only sold cubes. I found Dang Good Ice online and they made it easy to reserve what I needed, pay and pick it up. Service by Jeff was friendly and helpful. Will definitely go back when Im looking for blocks, or cubed ice for an event.

We love working with Dang Good Ice.  We have clients with massive outdoor events and ice is always an issue.  With Christine and Dex and the team they are beyond helpful and always amazing to work with.  Really appreciate all their efforts.
Great service! Needed a bunch of ice last minute for a wedding - and had no issues with Dex doing a delivery to North Van within 2 hours of my order! Really impressed!

I used another company for many years for our ice at Spirit Cruises Vancouver. When we started to realize that we were not being delivered the amount of ice that we were being billed for and there were trust issues, we turned to Dex at Dang Good ice. We have used Dang good Ice for 3 years now, in that time I have been able to trust that I am always getting what I have paid for and Dex at Dang Good Ice is just a text away when we require a delivery. Most importantly Dex is always there when he says he will be. I highly recommend this company and their great service. Thanks for being Dang Good

We used Dang Good Ice for our vendor booth the City of Port Moodys Car Free Day in August and absolutely LOVED working with Dex and his team.  They were beyond professional and there to answer any of our questions.  The ordering process was efficient and we were very impressed with how knowledgeable Dex was with our needs.  We would highly recommend their services and plan to use them again in the future for our vendor booths.

Awesome service. Called them up in a rush for ice and they were gladly able to sort me out. Recently tried out the delivery that they offer and once again, awesome service guys! Great source for ice blocks and all your ice needs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Julian, glad we could help. Stay Cool!

reviews.review_text: Good ice service. Super nice people. Come here for you need some ice
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your wonderful review! Were delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience with our Vancouver ice delivery service. We take pride in offering friendly and efficient service, and its fantastic to know that our team members left a positive impression. Were here whenever you need ice, so please dont hesitate to reach out.

reviews.review_text: I had an event where i requested an ice sculpture done, roughly 350lbs of Ice, and a large amount of dry ice for effects. All I can say when dealing with Dang Good Ice is there service is absolute top notch. Dex from start to finish was very professional and understanding in what I wanted, when I needed it and ensured that all deliveries of everything I ordered arrived flawlessly. I even had to call him during the event for an emergency delivery of more ice cubes as I ran out mid way through the event and pulled through with no hesitation. All I can say is for your next event whether its 5 bags of ice or entire tractor trailer full, this is the company you want keeping you cool.

I was the Event Manager for the Field Hockey Olympic Qualifier Canada vs Ireland and we worked with Dang Good Ice for our 2 game series. They supplied ice for our ice baths and beer garden. The customer service was excellent, they were professional, quick to reply and always friendly. I would highly recommend and would definitely use them again. Thank you!

Easy to order, easy to pick up, friendly staff.  Cheaper and more convenient than trying to buy a ton of little bags.  Also nice knowing its reserved and will be available when you have a scheduled event like we did. No complaints, would use them again!

Went to the gas station to get gas and thought it would be easier just to get ice there. Unfortunately was told that they had no more ice and also was informed by the attendant that I would have a hard time finding some due to the heat wave. I was busy at the time getting the food and  supplies for my camping trip, now driving around finding ice was the last thing I wanted to do. So I decided to look up for companies that sell ice, to my surprise I clicked on this certain link and it caught my attention. The crazy thing about this is that the place was 20 meters away from my location. Feeling like a kid from a candy shop,  I had the choices of different type of ice I wanted. They explained to me the best type of ice to use cause I told them I was going camping. Using a block of ice to keep your food or beverage cold in a cooler goes goes way further than getting ice cubes on a bag. Found that out quickly when I was at the camp ground and that fellow friends ice were already melting and their coolers were filled with water. Very appreciated from their tips and the price of ice is a  way better deal than any local stores. They just deal with ice and the people or business that need it. Quick and simple. Know now and my friends where to go .
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad we came to the rescue. Stay Cool

reviews.review_text: Dang Good Ice came to the rescue for us this weekend!  We needed a few bags quickly for some beer kegs that we d forgotten to purchase ice for ahead of time.  Dex was super accommodating, service was quick and easy and our problem was instantly solved.  Thanks for saving the wedding day Dang Good Ice!

We used Dang Good Ices service for the Brunch Affair in North Vancouver. From original contact to service delivery, they were very responsive, flexible (as I changed times and amounts a couple of times), and offered great customer service. Highly recommend for those looking for ice for your event and wanting to avoid the headaches of running around town stocking up.

I needed a large amount of ice for a large event on short notice. These guys game through for us at an amazing price. They were early on their delivery which gave us more time to get set up. I highly reccommend Dang Good Ive. Thanks again.

Dex was super great to work with and so efficient in answering all my inquiries for one of my upcoming events that was in less than a week! Dang Good Ice is so knowledgeable and I had no worries working with them at all. I highly recommend them for your party and event ice needs!

Friendly and Fast Service! I called Dang Good Ice last minute to deliver ice for my childs birthday party. Dex was there quickly and with a smile. Its always nice to deal with a friendly person like him. Ill definitely call Dang Good Ice in the future and Ill refer this company to all of my friends.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much ! really appreciate the positive feedback !

reviews.review_text: What a Dang Good experience! :) I approached Dang Good Ice for a birthday party that I was planning for my fiance. It was a busy day, and I didnt have time to pick any ice up. When I called the team, they inquired about the number of attendees and were able to determine exactly how much I needed. They also provided immediate delivery to my venue (delivery included!). Christina and her team were super accommodative and friendly. I would highly recommend Dang Good Ice to people who need bulk ice for any special event!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jenny ! Looking forward to keeping you cool again this year !

reviews.review_text: Easy to buy and delivery always on time. They walked up 12 bags 3 flights of stairs for our last event

Dex and Dang Good Ice were once again an amazing help to Parallel 49 at Hop Circuit. From the start it was a simple set up and any changes we needed to make Dex had no problem accommodating. On event day, Dex arrived 10 minutes early with our ice delivery and when we realized last minute we would need more, he was back within the hour to bring us more bags of ice. Incredible service! Cheers from Parallel 49 Brewing!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much Kristy ! Always happy to help out, looking forward to the new tasting lounge !

reviews.review_text: Exceptional service and price. Friendly staff and always reliable! I needed ice for a very large family reunion in a park. Even for local events like mine they came through with quality service. Have been recommending them to all friends who have businesses or are hosting many people and in need of lots of ice!

Excellent experience for my smaller event! Dang Good Ice was pleasant to deal with, and provided me with prompt and friendly service! I also saved money by using the service, and it saved me a trip to the gas station! :-)
Great service all around - helped to make our event a success. Well be recommending to friends and community.
We love working with Dang Good Ice! They have been a massive help for multiple events provided extraordinary customer service! Thank you Christina & Dex!
Reliable , best place to buy a ice on this warm weather around BC
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much, glad to help you stay cool.

reviews.review_text: These guys are great! Have bailed us out more than once when we were up the creek without a paddle. Fair prices, very friendly and quick service in a pinch for any operation, especially us big ones.

I was in a crunch for a very special birthday party, not only are they extremely knowledgeable and friendly but extremely professional. The prices are beyond reasonable, if your in need of big quantities of ice for any occasion you really need to check out dang good ice they truly live upto the name.

Excellent option/alternative for ice needs, especially for an outdoor festival.  Dang Good Service!  We ran low on occasion and had to call with short notice.  Dex was always quick to respond and positive with a can do attitude.

Dang Good Ice made our event seamless as they delivered the ice directly to the event site. Dex was wonderful at following up as well to see how the event went. Communication on delivery and payment was made quickly so that no time was wasted prior to the event.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Emma! HUB Cycling hosted a great event, was happy to be a part of it.

reviews.review_text: Top 5 Ice Company all time dead or alive! Great service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Being ranked as a top 5 ice company all time dead or alive is an honor, and were thrilled to hear that you think so highly of our Vancouver Ice Delivery service.

reviews.review_text: Dang Good donated ice for a Charity event with the Vancouver Fire Department.  This company was professional, energetic, and were generous in supporting a good cause.  Not to mention they delivered the ice on site to the event out in Spanish Banks!  Thank you so much for your support Dang Good!

We sell Dang hot sauce and we get wicked awesome service from Dang ice, they saved our bacon with the ice machine going down, but we got some ice and were able to stay open in the heat wave. Dang good job
Jeff was awesome in supplying ice and keeping everything cold as required for our event! Great service and great accommodation by this company!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear about your positive experience with our ice delivery service, and we greatly appreciate your kind words! Jeff is indeed a valuable member of our team, and were thrilled that he was able to supply ice and ensure everything stayed cold as needed for your event.

reviews.review_text: Easy to deal with and a great option for large ice orders.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your support means a lot to us, and we look forward to providing ice services to you again!

reviews.review_text: We have been using Dang good Ice for the last 3 years for our small business. Dex has given us the most reliable and fastest Ice delivery in Vancouver!
I have been working with Dang Good Ice and enjoy every transaction. They deliver to my specified location, on time and offer a tracking feature for all deliveries. Highly recommend !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words and positive feedback regarding our ice delivery service! We understand how crucial it is to have reliable vendors when organizing an event, and were thrilled to be that trusted choice for you.

reviews.review_text: These guys bartended my wedding reception, and they were awesome. They also brought ice. Very good, professional service, took care of everything that needed taking care of without any issues. Id hire them again without any hesitation.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Really appreciate the review! Thanks for letting us be apart of your big day !

reviews.review_text: Amazing service for our event and was able to delivery promptly. Thanks Jeff for helping us out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ensuring a seamless and streamlined process is what we aim for, and were glad to know that you found our services easy to use.

reviews.review_text: Excellent fast and above and beyond customer service. We will always rent from these guys and get ice from them as they are always reliable, punctual and offer the best customer service in town
Awmazing service and product! We were in a crunch and needed a rush on some ice for an event. Came so fast. Communication was also always punctual and product was great. Highly recommend.
We use them for all of our ice needs.  They have been very reliable and efficient.  Great customer service!  Even willing to help out with last minute needs.  Would highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the continue support :D

reviews.review_text: We used Dang Good Ice for our wedding and ended up running out of ice and they delivered more ice so quickly our guests werent effected in the slightest! I would definitely use them for our next event without hesitation
Dex at Dang Good Ice is the man to call for all of your event needs. They are always available at a moments notice and we use them exclusively for all of our concert series needs.
Great ice and lots of premium options as well.  Was very accommodating for pickup times but Ill probably take advantage of their delivery service next time.

Dang Good Ice gives Dang Good Service!!!!! Dex is always cool as a cucumber as well as friendly, patient, kind and generous! lEcole Bilingue had a Welcome Back BBQ Fundraiser last week, all monies raised goes towards the Grade 7s Quebec Exchange program in the Spring! It was a huge success and most are saying the Best WB BBQ Yet!!! Thanx to the support of the business community such as Dang Good Ice! Dex came through with a contribution  of Dang Good Ice for our WB BBQ as well as he was more than willing to deliver, at the last moment, as I was running late in my pickups!!! Dex saved my behind!!!! Thank you so kindly for your contribution and support Dex!!!!!! In Love and Light, Kathleen
Dang Good Photobooth was recommended by my friend and I was so pleased by the great service. Angela and her colleague was very helpful for our wedding night, I definitely recommend Dang Good!
Excellent service! Will definitely use this company again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear that you had an excellent experience with our Ice Delivery service.

reviews.review_text: First time Ive used this service and they were excellent!  Delivery options available, friendly staff and reliable service. Fast response times as well. Highly recommended!
Amazing service! Great customer service!! Highly recommended for any of your ice needs
These guys work hard and long tiring days; they have earned my support and its great to stop buying overpriced ice at stores!  This serviced is a no-brainer, get on board......
Would recommend this company to anyone who needs to stay a little cool
reviews.response_from_owner_text: If you or anyone you know ever requires our services in the future, please feel free to reach out. Were here to help you beat the heat!

reviews.review_text: I was looking for a place for block ice, and this is it. Friendly service, too. And to boot, their website is pretty good for ordering, even in small quantities.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words James - glad you enjoyed the block ice, its a new product we added for the summer!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely great humans, product is always just how I want it, frozen :) and delivery is always on time and with a smile.
The team was a great resource for my event and the delivery team was fantastic! Wont hesitate to use them again.
LOVE the product and the folks at Dang Good Ice!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks David, glad to help you with your ice needs.

reviews.review_text: The best in the business for sure, will always make it happen in one way or another, and the owner is such a sweetheart
Great service! Responsive, efficient, and flexible - met all our needs for our event!
Great service and easy to work with. We needed a lot of ice in a hurry and they managed our needs within a couple of hours.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Thomas - glad we can help :)

reviews.review_text: Excellent service! Thanks guys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience with our Vancouver Ice Delivery service. If you ever need ice or assistance in the future, please feel free to reach out. Were here to help!

reviews.review_text: Best service! He will go above and beyond for you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Going above and beyond for our customers is what we strive for

reviews.review_text: Fabulous service and experience! They went above and beyond to provide ice to our event.  Pricing couldnt be beat.  Will absolutely use them again.
